snippet: An eight-film series programmed by Lena Dunham, the creator and star of “Tiny Furniture” and “Girls,” will run at BAMcinématek April 2-8.
abstract: An eight-film series programmed by Lena Dunham, the creator and star of “Tiny Furniture” and “Girls,” will run at BAMcinématek April 2-8.

headline.main: Lena Dunham Brings a 'Girls' Touch to Brooklyn Academy Film Series
headline.print_headline: Lena Dunham Chooses Films for BAM Series
